title: Sample AD2CP Files
author: Dan Kelley
date: "`Sys.date()`"
---

```{r}
library(oce)
files <- c(
    list.files("~/Dropbox/oce_secret_data/ad2cp/", "*.ad2cp", full.names=TRUE),
    list.files("~/git/oce/tests/testthat/local_data/ad2cp", "*.ad2cp", full.names=TRUE))
for (file in files)
{
    cat(file, "\n")
    print(read.adp.ad2cp(file, which="?"))
    cat("\n\n")
}
